con:configuration.scriptText:
import com.eviware.soapui.support.*
def cookie = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("REST Request - Add_New_Customer").testRequest.response.responseHeaders["Set-Cookie"].toString();
log.info cookie
context.testCase.setPropertyValue("Cookie1",cookie)
